objective_title: Free flowing and ecologically healthy river
kr_description: USACE conduct a disposition study on Miller's Ferry and Claiborne Dams. (a disposition study gives the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers the authority to evaluate a project which is no longer serving its authorized purpose.)

objective_title: Free flowing and ecologically healthy river
kr_description: Congress enacts language in WRDA that requires deauthorization of the dams

objective_title: Free flowing and ecologically healthy river
kr_description: Congress secures/allocates the funds needed for removal and removal is implemented;

objective_title: Free flowing and ecologically healthy river
kr_description: Those who are harmed by any changes resulting from the dam removal are made whole;
